references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of causal representation learning, introducing the core concepts and challenges addressed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Challenging common assumptions in the unsupervised learning of disentangled representations
references.reason: This paper highlights the inherent challenges in disentangled representation learning, providing context for the need of interventions in causal representation learning.
This paper directly addresses interventional causal representation learning and serves as a starting point for extending single-node interventions to multi-node settings.

references.paper_title: Score-based causal representation learning with interventions
references.reason: This paper introduces the score-based framework for causal representation learning using single-node interventions which is extended in the current paper to handle multi-node interventions.

references.paper_title: General identifiability and achievability for causal representation learning
references.reason: This paper provides identifiability and achievability results for single-node interventions that are leveraged and extended in the current paper for unknown multi-node interventions.
